7 𐍃𐌰𐌼𐌰𐌸 gesammt samst(tag) SAMBET(Tag) semaine(week) vs 𓁶 𓏤 𓇳 𓎆 ten day week

𓋴 𓈖 𓃀 𓏏 𓊗 𓏮 | farewell | sane… SAMBET PSM !

𓋵 𓇳 σήμερον sḗmeron yesterday

𓇼 the five stars are the missing days in the calendar year of 360+5 days
360 = 6×60 = 3(Seasons)×120 = 30×12 (months with 3 weeks à 10 days) = 10 × 36 decan constallations 10

The 'M' in the root SAMBET was not added to semitic Sabat שַׁבָּת shabát,
Sabat is a contraction of Sambet! However it was a pretty early one: 𒋗𒁀𒀜 šu-ba-at jubilations

𓊃Sym was reduced to Sys/Sy-

SEMIT

zambet > zaman(time/Zeit)

Week-Days are often counted with šämbe 𓊃𓊪𓊗 :
шәмбе (šämbe) Full/Half-Week 'Saturday'
якшәмбе (yakşämbe) 1st = Sunday
дүшәмбе (düšämbe) 2nd = Monday
сишәмбе (sişämbe) 3rd = Tuesday
…
